Kontakt Anders Orset

    Anders Orset

    I currently work as a full stack developer doing projects for my own company Akotek.

    I worked as a Java Developer at Bouvet from 1st of August 2017 til the end of August 2018.

    Before I finished my bachelor's degree in programming and networks at the University of Oslo in the spring of 2017, I worked for the Communications Department at Skanska Norway and Statsbygg.

    Before that, I did a master's degree in political science, bachelor degrees in journalism and comparative politics and various jobs as a journalist.
